summary: This document discusses the procurement of a DC-3 type aircraft for a group of stranded newsmen, code-named AMCORE-2, in SDOM (Santo Domingo). It outlines the plan to arrange a charter through KUBARK proprietary and potentially involve Mackey Airlines. The document also mentions providing cover stories and financial arrangements for the charter.
title: Immediate SDOM INFO IMMEDIATE DIR SNDRCITE WAVE 5413
